page.title: 08PRIMARY SCHOOLS
page.content: OUR PRIMARY SCHOOLS HAVE PUPILS FROM 5 YEARS OLD TO 11 YEARS OLD.IN THESE SCHOOLS OUR MAIN LESSONS ARE ENGLISH, MATHEMATICS,RELIGIOUS EDUCATION,ART AND CRAFT,SCIENCE AND PHYSICAL EDUCATION. THE MOST INTERESTING WORK WE DO IS OUR PROJECT WORK.DURING OUR PRIMARY SCHOOL LIFE WE COVER INDIANS,THE MIDDLE AGES, EUROPE,HOUSES AND HOMES,THE TWENTIETH CENTURY AND MANY MORE. WE HAVE B.B.C. COMPUTERS THAT EVERYONE USES,FROM THE YOUNGEST CHILD TO THE OLDEST TEACHER. WHEN WE LEAVE FOR SECONDARY SCHOOL WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO READ AND WRITE INTELLIGENTLY AND BE OF AN ENQUIRING MIND.NEAR THE END OF OUR TIME IN PRIMARY SCHOOL WE TAKE THE 11+ EXAMINATION.THE RESULTS OF THIS DECIDE WHICH SECONDARY SCHOOL WE WILL ATTEND.
